text:
CNN will host a town hall on racial inequality and COVID-19 Sunday at 9 p.m. ET featuring:

• Mayor Muriel Bowser of Washington, DC
• Mayor Keisha Lance Bottoms of Atlanta
• Mayor Lori Lightfoot of Chicago
• Mayor London Breed of San Francisco https://t.co/2Ry7okFz18 https://t.co/4DdQlEeE7W
